name: @crypto-trading/dry-run-engine
description: Dry run engine to simulate strategy execution and persist via TypeORM dry-run entities

scripts.build: tsdown src/index.ts --format cjs && tsdown src/index.ts --format esm && tsc --project tsconfig.build.json && (cp dist/src/index.d.ts dist/ 2>/dev/null || cp dist/dry-run-engine/src/index.d.ts dist/ 2>/dev/null || true) && (cp dist/src/index.d.ts.map dist/ 2>/dev/null || cp dist/dry-run-engine/src/index.d.ts.map dist/ 2>/dev/null || true)
